sn35.15:1.3: Yāvatā cakkhussa assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.15:1.6: Yāvatā cakkhussa ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.15:1.9: Yāvatā cakkhussa nissaraṇaṁ, paññāya me taṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ.
sn35.15:1.14: Yāvatā jivhāya assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.15:1.17: Yāvatā jivhāya ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.15:1.20: Yāvatā jivhāya nissaraṇaṁ, paññāya me taṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ …pe…
sn35.15:1.23: Yāvatā manassa assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.15:1.26: Yāvatā manassa ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.15:1.29: Yāvatā manassa nissaraṇaṁ, paññāya me taṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ.
sn35.15:2.1: Yāvakīvañcāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ channaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ āyatanānaṁ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nābbhaññāsiṁ …pe…
sn35.15:2.4: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
